course.subject: IEDA
course.name: Numerical Methods for Financial Engineering
course.description: The course aims to introduce various important numerical methods that have been widely applied in financial engineering. More specifically, the topics consist primarily of lattice methods, Monte Carlo simulation, and finite difference methods. Furthermore, broad applications of these numerical methods in financial engineering are also covered.
course.prerequisites: (IEDA 3250 OR ISOM 2500) AND (IEDA 3330 OR FINA 3203)
